Class QuestionAndAnswer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.domain.QuestionAndAnswer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class QuestionAndAnswer
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The Class QuestionAndAnswer. A MFA security question and answer object. This is used in both requests and responses.
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.
